column4: Hi! I just installed Warcraft III with wine.. the installation worked fine but when I get to the menu in the game it's all very very dark, almost black. But I can use the menu through my keyboard pushing 'L' for example. Anyone who's got any ideas?
sorry can't help you there, warcraft3 works perfect here except for that pesky save bug
too bad.. do you have nvidia or radeon card?
